p:
The ZIKV Cambodian strain FSS13025 (GenBank number KU955593.1, referred as WT in text) was produced from an infectious cDNA clone
47 . The ZIKV 3’UTR-∆10-LAV strain was generated from the FSS13025 infectious cDNA clone
12 . The Zika Puerto Rico strain PRVABC59 (GenBank number KU501215) used for challenge was obtained originally from Dr. Robert Tesh from the World Reference Center of Emerging Virus and Arboviruses (WRCEVA) at UTMB. ZIKV-specific HMAF (hyper-immune ascitic fluid, dilution 1:2,000) was also obtained from Dr. Robert Tesh from WRCEVA at UTMB.
